name: Fruit Catcher (Marrick)
description:
A simple game about catching fruit. It gets more difficult as you progress. If you miss three fruits, you must restart.

Golden fruits give you five points instead of one.

Hearts will restore a life.

Clocks will slow how fast the fruits fall.

This is my first game, so it's not anything grand, but it works! Probably! Let me know if it doesn't.
